hero.title: A Discord Bot that breaks down language barriers.
hero.description: TransCord translates messages and text. Anyone can easily enjoy international communication using commands.

features.title: Key Features of TransCord
features.description: Combining simplicity with high functionality. Easily translate messages on any server.

multilingual_support.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual_support.description: TransCord currently supports translation in 30+ languages. We can add more supported languages upon request.

translation.title: Easy Translation
translation.description: You can translate messages from the slash command or the message context menu.

easy_setup.title: Easy Setup
easy_setup.description: Simply install the bot to complete the setup, and you can start using the translation features right away.

slash_commands.title: Slash Commands
slash_commands.description: Fully compatible with Discord's latest slash commands. Command input is easy and intuitive.

fast_stable.title: Fast & Stable
fast_stable.description: Optimized code and a stable infrastructure provide a stress-free, high-speed translation experience.

high_customization.title: High Customization
high_customization.description: You can configure the message display type and translation language. Customize it flexibly to suit your needs and preferences.

blog.title: Blog
blog.not_found_message: Sorry, we couldn't find the post you're looking for.
